duck: Chapada - A chapada is a plateau found in the Brazilian Highlands.
Butte - A butte is a conspicuous isolated hill with steep, often vertical sides and a small, relatively flat top; buttes are smaller than mesas, plateaus, and table landforms.
Atherton Tableland - The Atherton Tableland is a fertile plateau which is part of the Great Dividing Range in Queensland, Australia.
Deosai National Park - The Deosai National Park is located in the Skardu District of Gilgit-Baltistan province, in northernmost Pakistan.
plateau definition: a usually extensive land area having a relatively level surface raised sharply above adjacent land on at least one side.
In geology and earth science, a plateau (or  plural plateaus or rarely plateaux), also called a high plain or tableland, is an area of highland, usually consisting of relatively flat terrain.
Mesa - A mesa (Spanish and Portuguese for table) is the American English term for tableland, an elevated area of land with a flat top and sides that are usually steep cliffs.
